name: @astuteo/tailwind-breakout-grid
description: A Tailwind CSS plugin for creating fluid breakout grid layouts with optimal reading widths
author: Astuteo LLC

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run check-files
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run check-files
scripts.release:patch: npm run release && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run release && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm run release && npm version major && git push && git push --tags
